artist: Artist: Seth Tobocman , et al.; Publisher: SHADOW Press, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanic image of expressionist police and civilian figures with text printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 64 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Killer Kop Komix, no. 1
